mapper.select: select type from target_type where target = #{target} and t_id = #{tId};
mapper.insert: insert into target_type (userid, target, type, t_id) values (#{userid},#{target},#{type},#{tId});
mapper.update: update target_type set type = #{type} where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId};
mapper.select: select type from target_type where userid = #{userid} and t_id = #{tId};
